name.jp: 勇気のドラゴンマント

description.en: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.ar: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.br: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.cns: 印有显眼龙纹的披风，强者的象征。全属性+6，最大HP+200。
description.de: Der Dragon Cloak of the Spellweaver erhöht alle Statuswerte um +6 und deine HP um +200. Das Siegel des Drachen wird deutlich sichtbar angezeigt.
description.fi: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.fil: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.fr: La Cape du Dragon Valeureux augmente toutes les statistiques de base de +6 et les Points de Vie de 200. Le sceau du dragon est bien en vue.
description.id: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.it: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.jp: 勇気のドラゴンマントは、すべてのステータスが+6、HP最大値が+200増加します。ドラゴンの紋章が際立つ。
description.kr: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.nl: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.pl: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.ru: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.sp: La Capa Dragón Tejehechizos aumenta las estadísticas base en +6 y la HP Máxima en +200. El Sello del Dragón se muestra de forma destacada.
description.sw: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.th: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.tw: 行家的龍斗篷增加+6的基本屬性和最大HP+200。龍印顯現在斗篷上。
description.vi: The Spellweaver's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
